title: How to See the Toilet Easter Egg on Rooftops in Gears of War

steps.headline: Enter a match on the level Rooftops in Versus mode.
steps.description: You can either join a Rooftops match or host your own. However, it may be advisable to view this Easter egg while playing in a player or local match, rather in a ranked multiplayer game, as other players may get annoyed if you are not trying to play and win.

steps.headline: Wait until you spawn on the dark side of the map.
steps.description: On side of Rooftops is far darker than the other; this is the side you want to be on.

steps.headline: Move through the level until you are directly behind your side's Hammer of Dawn bunker.
steps.description: You should be facing away from the centre of the map, towards a damaged, multi-level building on the outside of the level.

steps.headline: Look for three windows directly in front of you.
steps.description: There will be one undamaged window, with two broken windows on either side; the Toilet Easter Egg is behind the unbroken window.

steps.headline: Either pick up the Hammer of Dawn or select your Smoke Grenade from your inventory.
steps.description: Using the Smoke grenade is far easier than viewing the Easter egg with the Hammer of Dawn, although it won't light up the area as much for you to see.

steps.headline: Throw your Smoke Grenade into the left, broken window, angled towards the middle window.
steps.description: Or alternatively, aim and fire the Hammer of Dawn at the middle window until it lights the room inside up.

steps.headline: View the Toilet Easter Egg while either the smoke or beam from the Hammer of Dawn light the room inside up.
steps.description: There will be a giant dead body sitting on the toilet by the middle window. This is the Toilet Easter Egg.

text: Enter a match on the level Rooftops in Versus mode. You can either join a Rooftops match or host your own. However, it may be advisable to view this Easter egg while playing in a player or local match, rather in a ranked multiplayer game, as other players may get annoyed if you are not trying to play and win. Wait until you spawn on the dark side of the map. On side of Rooftops is far darker than the other; this is the side you want to be on. Move through the level until you are directly behind your side's Hammer of Dawn bunker. You should be facing away from the centre of the map, towards a damaged, multi-level building on the outside of the level. Look for three windows directly in front of you. There will be one undamaged window, with two broken windows on either side; the Toilet Easter Egg is behind the unbroken window. Either pick up the Hammer of Dawn or select your Smoke Grenade from your inventory. Using the Smoke grenade is far easier than viewing the Easter egg with the Hammer of Dawn, although it won't light up the area as much for you to see. Throw your Smoke Grenade into the left, broken window, angled towards the middle window. Or alternatively, aim and fire the Hammer of Dawn at the middle window until it lights the room inside up. View the Toilet Easter Egg while either the smoke or beam from the Hammer of Dawn light the room inside up. There will be a giant dead body sitting on the toilet by the middle window. This is the Toilet Easter Egg.
